mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, reg_date) VALUES (bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId

SELECT b.num, b.userId, userName, subject, TO_CHAR(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, hitCount, saveFilename, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM bbsReply WHERE answer = 0 AND showReply=1 GROUP BY num ) c ON b.num = c.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT b.num, b.userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, b.reg_date, saveFilename, originalFilename, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM bbsLike GROUP BY num ) bc ON b.num = bc.num WHERE b.num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bbsLike WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bbsLike WHERE num=#{num}
SELECT num, userId FROM bbsLike WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbsReply(replyNum, num, userId, content, answer, showReply, reg_date) VALUES (bbsReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{answer}, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbsReply WHERE num=#{num} AND answer=0
AND ( showReply=1 OR ( showReply=0 AND userId=#{userId} ) )

SELECT r.replyNum, r.userId, userName, num, content, r.reg_date, NVL(showReply, 1) showReply, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount FROM bbsReply r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM bbsReply WHERE answer!=0
AND ( showReply=1 OR ( showReply=0 AND userId=#{userId} ) )
GROUP BY answer ) a ON r.replyNum = a.answer LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM bbsReplyLike GROUP BY replyNum ) c ON r.replyNum = c.replyNum WHERE num=#{num} AND r.answer=0
AND ( showReply=1 OR ( showReply=0 AND r.userId=#{userId} ) )
ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbsReply WHERE answer = #{answer}
AND ( showReply=1 OR ( showReply=0 AND userId=#{userId} ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbsReplyLike(replyNum, userId, replyLike) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{userId}, #{replyLike})
mapper.update: UPDATE bbsReply SET showReply = #{showReply} WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} AND userId = #{userId}
